sentence.Network_en: Therefore, every country in the world is actively doing the research on digital light - duty Automatic Howitzer.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是却难以满足现代战争的需要, 因而世界各国都在积极研制数字化、轻型化的自走火炮.

sentence.Network_en: The final version, Ausf N, mounted a short 75 mm howitzer for use in infantry support.
sentence.Network_cn: III号 坦克最后的版本-N型, 安装了短管的75毫米榴弹炮,用于步兵支援.

sentence.Network_en: Cannon: Long - range artillery piece , as distinguished from other Big guns such as the howitzer or mortar.
sentence.Network_cn: 火炮: 远射 程,加农炮、榴弹炮或迫击炮之通称.

list.abs: Heavy howitzer: These cannon only fire ballistically, have a low rate .详细重型榴弹炮:这些火炮只能进行弹道射击,射速低,射程极远并能造.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Dutch houwitser, from German Haubitze, from Czech houfnice 'catapult'

entry.def: A howitzer is a large gun with a short barrel, which fires shells high up into the air so that they will drop down onto the target.

means.word_mean: 1. a muzzle-loading high-angle gun with a short barrel that fires shells at high elevations for a short range
